attributes.action: make sure that the fundamentals of a new home, i.e. heating, ventilation, drainage and plumbing are installed such that the house is fit to live in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New build home.
NHBC warranty worthless
Not inspected.
Poor health.
Drains, smells, heating, ventilation, poor plumbing
No pumping station installed
What NHBC has installed rads by a building co. and new boiler from corgi reg chap is no better.Continue to struggle.
Smells from underground and gasy.
NHBC have said that the legal onus is on us to prove our case!!
Bed 5 over garage was found to have no insulation!  NHBC did not then check the rest of the property.
The builder's 2 year initial liabilty is not long enough by far to find   the problems
We have no damp course,re-inforcement in the wrong place
Drains leaking
Soil stacks not connected 
Run water the smell is the same.
NHBC know what has gone wrong during construction.
Dug drains sent a solicitor's letter to inform us when  openings up had taken place such a surveyor could attend to investigate  subfloor void.
Didn't do this,they reconcreted the floor
Letter to tell us if we attended site they would install a locked site entrance!!
They payed rent on the other property we had to live in.
We payed council tax on both properties
and they offered £10 to pay for the electrics they used!!
Please can someone help us.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
